txt.en:
While exploring Imping, you notice a number of tool-packs containing various collections of ancient-looking woodworking tools. 

You take it upon yourself to collect these packs so that they can be returned to their proper owners.

<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest requires Imping: The Miller's Foe to be underway in order to access Imping. If that quest has been completed or failed, you will be unable to exit and re-enter Imping in order to complete this quest.</rgb>

While exploring Imping, you notice a number of tool-packs containing various collections of ancient-looking woodworking tools. 

You take it upon yourself to collect these packs so that they can be returned to their proper owners.

<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest requires Imping: The Miller's Foe to be underway in order to access Imping. If that quest has been completed or failed, you will be unable to exit and re-enter Imping in order to complete this quest.</rgb>
'This is very kind of you, [placeholder]. Losing such precious heirlooms would surely devastate the millers. I will see that each is returned to its owner.'
You should collect the heirloom tools left behind in the lumber-yard and bring them to Ethelbryt.
'I see that you have found some of the heirlooms used by the Men of Imping. These tools have been passed down through generations of woodworkers. \n\n'Were these all you were able to find?'
